function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of early warning system for pandemics","Impact":"Potential for delayed response to future pandemics, leading to increased spread and impact","Mitigation":"Developing an advanced early warning system for detecting and monitoring potential pandemics","Technologies":"Advanced monitoring and surveillance technologies, data analytics, and predictive modeling","People":"Global population, public health organizations","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Challenges in scaling conventional testing for mass surveillance","Impact":"Inadequate monitoring and surveillance of population for pandemic spread, leading to higher risk of undetected cases and spread","Mitigation":"Developing cost-effective and high-throughput testing methods for mass surveillance, including pooled sampling","Technologies":"Advanced diagnostic testing technology, automation, and high-throughput screening platforms","People":"Public health organizations, testing laboratories","Owner":"Healthcare agencies, research institutions"},{"Description":"Lack of environmental science tools for monitoring pandemic spread","Impact":"Inability to effectively monitor and assess pandemic spread in populations and environmental settings","Mitigation":"Developing environmental science-based monitoring and epidemiological tools for population-wide health assessment","Technologies":"Wastewater-based epidemiology, environmental monitoring sensors, data analytics, and population-wide monitoring platforms","People":"Environmental scientists, public health organizations","Owner":"Environmental research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
